MADDPGAlgorithm module¶

class MADDPGAlgorithm.MADDPGAlgorithm(observation_space: int, action_space: dict, configs: dict)¶

Bases: shiva.algorithms.Algorithm.Algorithm

update(agents, buffer, step_count, episodic)¶

Updates the agents network using the data

Input

agent: the agent who we want to update it’s network data: data used to train the network episodic: flag indicating if the update is episodic or per timestep

Return

None
